message: Identified 8 MCP tools: create_real_task, deploy_headless_agent, get_real_task_status, get_agent_output, kill_real_agent, update_agent_progress, report_agent_finding, spawn_child_agent. Also found 3 MCP resources for task listing and status.
Architecture: Dual backend system (tmux+claude CLI vs cursor-agent), atomic file locking for registry operations, cross-project workspace discovery, anti-spiral protection with multiple layers

Agent coordination: Agents self-report via update_agent_progress and report_agent_finding. System provides minimal_coordination_info on each call to prevent log bloat. JSONL-based progress/findings tracking with intelligent truncation.
